mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardno, accountno, managerno, crudcateno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bpasswd, btag, bphoto, bphotosaved, bthumb, bsize, bvisible) VALUES (board_seq.nextval, #{accountno}, #{managerno}, #{crudcateno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, #{bpasswd}, #{btag}, #{bphoto}, #{bphotosaved}, #{bthumb}, #{bsize}, 'Y')
mapper.select:
SELECT boardno, accountno, managerno, crudcateno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, btag, bphoto, bphotosaved, bthumb, bsize, breplycnt, bview, brecom, bvisible, tagno FROM board
AND (UPPER(btitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(bcontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(btag) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM board
AND (UPPER(btitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(bcontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(btag) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')

SELECT boardno, accountno, managerno, crudcateno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, btag, LOWER(bphoto) as bphoto, bphotosaved, bthumb, bsize, breplycnt, bview, brecom, bvisible, tagno FROM board WHERE crudcateno = #{crudcateno} ORDER BY boardno DESC
